PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_ManufacturerTypeInformation
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: Defines characteristics of manufactured products that may be given by the manufacturer. Note that the term 'manufactured' may also be used to refer to products that are supplied and identified by the supplier or that are assembled off site by a third party provider. This property set replaces the entity IfcManufacturerInformation from previous IFC releases.

PropertyDef.Name: ArticleNumber
PropertyDef.Definition: Article number or reference that may be applied to a product according to a standard scheme for article number definition (e.g. UN, EAN)

PropertyDef.Name: ModelReference
PropertyDef.Definition: The name of the manufactured item as used by the manufacturer.

PropertyDef.Name: ModelLabel
PropertyDef.Definition: The model number and/or unit designator assigned by the manufacturer of the manufactured item.

PropertyDef.Name: Manufacturer
PropertyDef.Definition: The organization that manufactured and/or assembled the item.

PropertyDef.Name: ProductionYear
PropertyDef.Definition: The year of production of the manufactured item.
